drawer.slogan: A new way to know the world

auth-screen.checkbox-text: By checking this box, I agree to The BD-Feature
auth-screen.bottom-text: We welcome debate and dissent, but personal attacks (on authors, other users or any individual), abuse and defamatory language will not be tolerated. Nor will we tolerate attempts to deliberately disrupt discussions. We aim to maintain The Conversation as an inviting space to focus on intelligent discussions. Please be courteous.

section-one.title: Next, Check your email
section-one.description: We’ve sent you instructions to activate your account. If it doesn’t arrive in an hour, please check your spam or junk mail folder. If it’s still not there, please email

section-two.title: Subscribe our free newsletter
section-two.description: Our free newsletters bring the latest analysis and commentary directly from the brightest academic authors to your inbox each morning.

newsletter-screen.input-bottom-text: Please enter a valid email address

newletter-confirm-screen.text-one: You’re now signed up for this newsletter and will start receiving it soon.
newletter-confirm-screen.title-one: To ensure you see our emails:
newletter-confirm-screen.text-two: If you don’t see a welcome message in your inbox shortly, please check your spam folder or “Promotions” tab. If it’s there, you can move it to your main inbox, or mark it “not spam”.
newletter-confirm-screen.item-one: We publish trustworthy, fact-based articles written by academic experts
newletter-confirm-screen.item-two: We are free from the influence of advertisers, politics, big business and billionaire owners. As a nonprofit organization, our only motivation is to ensure reliable information reaches as broad an audience as possible
newletter-confirm-screen.item-three: We are committed to accuracy. We carefully vet the experts who write for us. When we make mistakes, we promptly correct them Who We Are

post-detail-screen.description: Our free newsletters bring the latest analysis and commentary directly from the brightest academic authors to your inbox each morning.
